holidays.title: National Eat What You Want Day
holidays.description: Treat yourself by giving in to your sweet tooth, and eating breakfast for dinner.

holidays.title: Hostess CupCake Day
holidays.description: We’re ditching our diets and getting a taste of some delicious Hostess CupCakes!

holidays.title: Make a Book Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the ability of books to open doors to other realms and alternate realities!

holidays.title: National Children's Mental Health Awareness Day
holidays.description: Get ready to spend a day with children as their mental support structure.

holidays.title: National Foam Rolling Day
holidays.description: Roll out those muscles and replace soreness and aches with relief and flexibility.

holidays.title: National Technology Day
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate yet another ground-breaking achievement in technology.

holidays.title: National Twilight Zone Day
holidays.description: Science fiction, horror, supernatural drama, and unexpected twists.

holidays.title: Somerset Day
holidays.description: From cheese and cider to history and culture, let’s explore the origins of Somerset Day!

holidays.title: World Ego Awareness Day
holidays.description: Assess yourself and your relationship with others this World Ego Awareness Day.

holidays.title: Arlene MC’s Birthday
holidays.description: She’s a rising urban Latino artist in America and there’s no stopping her!

holidays.title: Blac Chyna’s Birthday
holidays.description: From dancing and modeling to entrepreneurship and reality T.V., Blac Chyna is a true star.

holidays.title: Cam Newton’s Birthday
holidays.description: There’s just no stopping when it comes to this multi-award-winning football player!

holidays.title: Prince Royce’s Birthday
holidays.description: He launched his professional music career in 2010 with the release of his self-titled album.

holidays.title: Sabrina Carpenter’s Birthday
holidays.description: There’s no stopping once you know where your passion lies and this multi-talented star proves it.
